[ library(cgi) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

substitute_placeholders(+PageTemplate, +NameValuePairs, -Page)

Substitute placeholders in a html source with a value string

Description

Takes a string (usually a html-source) with embedded placeholders and replaces the placeholders by their value according to the NameValuePairs argument. The syntax for placeholders is their name enclosed in ^ (up arrow) characters.

See Also

posted_params / 1, get_param_value / 3
